subject: Your You Tube explanatiohn
author: aileengaroutte
full_text:
Dear Frank:

Yes, I watched your You Tube on how a box works.  It explained it so easily but now I have to get the equipment to do it.  

It seems a miracle you can understand what the voices are saying!  That would be the hardest thing to do I think.

Thank you for replying.

Aileen
